text: Jiaru tamen jujue [zhenli] shi ni nankan [he buneng renshou tamen de shanghai], name, jiaru ni neng zhaodao yitiao ru di de suidao huo yi ba deng tian de tizi, yibian ni neng dai gei tamen yi zhong jixiang [ni zuo bu dao, suoyi ying rennai]. Jiaru an la yiyu, ta bi ba tamen dou jihe yu [huo yin shang] zhengdao, suoyi, ni jue buyao zuo wu zhi zhe.
